Gun Ji

Korean: 건지

Hometown:

Anyang, Gyeonggi-do

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Kim Gun-ji
Native name:
김건지
Birthday:
Feb 28, 1992
Age:
33 years old
Blood type:

Height:
5'4" (161 cm)
Group (2005-2022):
Gavy NJ

Introduction

Gunji is a South Korean independent singer-songwriter. She is a former member of the female pop ballad trio Gavy NJ. She made her solo debut on January 28, 2023 with the digital single "I Know It Won't Be".
